hooks.command: echo 'Notifying team of push...' && curl -X POST -H 'Content-type: application/json' --data '{"text":"Claude Code pushed changes to $(git branch --show-current): $(git log -1 --pretty=format:\"%s\")"}' $SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL
echo 'Logging commit activity...' && echo "$(date): COMMIT by Claude Code: $(git log -1 --pretty=format:'%h %s')" >> .claude/activity.log

echo 'API change detected - notifying backend team' && curl -X POST -H 'Content-type: application/json' --data '{"text":"⚠️ API changes detected in $(pwd) - Backend team please review"}' $BACKEND_SLACK_CHANNEL

echo 'Test file updated - running test suite' && npm run test && curl -X POST -H 'Content-type: application/json' --data '{"text":"✅ Tests updated and passing in $(basename $(pwd))"}' $QA_SLACK_CHANNEL
echo 'Documentation updated' && curl -X POST -H 'Content-type: application/json' --data '{"text":"📚 Documentation updated by Claude Code in $(basename $(pwd))"}' $DOCS_SLACK_CHANNEL

echo "Claude Code session started in $(basename $(pwd))" && curl -X POST -H 'Content-type: application/json' --data '{"text":"🤖 Claude Code session started in $(basename $(pwd)) by $USER"}' $DEV_SLACK_CHANNEL

echo "Claude Code session ended - summary:" && git log --oneline -10 && curl -X POST -H 'Content-type: application/json' --data '{"text":"🏁 Claude Code session completed in $(basename $(pwd))"}' $DEV_SLACK_CHANNEL
